alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Marion; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 9:05PM CDT until April 04 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN POLK...NORTHWESTERN MARION...SOUTHWESTERN JASPER AND WARREN COUNTIES... At 905 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Spring Hill, or 5 miles north of Indianola, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Ackworth around 910 PM CDT. Pleasant Hill, Carlisle and Iowa State Fairgrounds around 915 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hartford, Runnells and Swan. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 47 and 69, and between mile markers 87 and 91. Interstate 80 between mile markers 134 and 147. Interstate 235 between mile markers 4 and 14. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and south central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
